description:
For a while, nova has supported specifying the keystone authentication info in a [keystone_authtoken] section in nova.conf, instead of a [filter:authtoken] section of api-paste.ini. However, in the nova repository, the example keystone authentication info is still in api-paste.ini instead of nova.conf.sample.

It is easier on operators if only the nova.conf file needs to be edited, and seeing the content in etc/nova/api-paste.ini can be
confusing.

I recommend moving the content from api-paste.ini to nova.conf.sample.

Note that this requires modifying devstack since removing these lines from api-paste.ini will cause devstack to fail, and it's used to gate nova.
title: Move keystone auth to nova.conf.sample
